item.title: Subnetting
item.description: Important things to know before learning Subnetting is a bit complicated, here we will learn how to find the subnet address, 1st host address, last host adress and the broadcast address by knowing the IP address. There are some methods which is quicker, but I feel once you mastered some binary tasks, you will be able to do this quicker. I feel this is a lot more safer and more efficient way to do it.
